column4: i am getting an error message from xine: source seems to be encrypted when i try to play a dvd i bought and it plays fine in a normal dvd player... ideas?
you need libdvdcss2. Install libdvdread3 and check /us/share/doc/libdvdread3/exampels. There should be a shell script, run that using sudo.,
Ouch. Is DMA enabled on the drive?
